PageTitle: clock time enable (virtual access port-extension view)
FuncDef:
The clock time enable command enables time synchronization.
The undo clock time enable command disables time synchronization.
By default, time synchronization is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The clock time enable command enables time synchronization.
The undo clock time enable command disables time synchronization.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
